value:
The cloaks worn in the Order of
Heroes are striking. I'd like to stitch
a good recruiting slogan on them.

I have long served the royal house
of Ylisse. I shall continue when I
return there one day.

I appreciate your checking in on
me. I serve another master, but
you have earned my respect.

Would you care to weed the garden
with me sometime? A well-tended
garden is the surest sign of nobility.

I stand ready with a hand-knit muffler
to place about my liege's neck at
the very moment he may sneeze.

Pardon the intrusion. I've come
on a mission from your friend
$Nf.$k$pThat mission? To pass along
warmest greetings.
I will use this power to protect us!

Slow but steady—the best road
for a knight.
Hmm. I need to apply myself more.

I shall test my new power right
away, picking up pebbles!

I am Frederick, a royal knight and
a guiding hand in the Shepherds.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.

Why, you're hard at work as
always, $Nu!$k$pIf you're on patrol, please allow
me to assist you.$k$pI shall try to predict your path and
remove any pebbles or weeds that
might obstruct your progress.$k$pMy foremost duty will always be to
the royal house of Ylisse—that will
never change. But...$k$pI feel I should make time to look
after you as well. Perhaps I've
grown attached to you...$k$pWell, enough lollygagging—I have
pebbles to clear. Please, don't
mind me! Continue patrolling!
せいっ！
はああっ！
ぐあっ！
A mistake...
Your last breath approaches.
Aaaaand now!
Not while I draw breath!
For milord Chrom!
Must retreat...
Whew...
A knight must constantly strive for excellence.
My first task is always the safety of the royal family.
Today, like every other day, I woke up early to clear away pebbles.
I notice there are weeds about. I shall pluck them until you can hire a gardener.
The commissary is serving bear meat? I believe I shall skip dinner today.
Where could my lord Chrom be...
Should we camp outdoors, you may rely on me for a magnificent campfire.
Yes.
Indeed.
Of course.
